alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 17 at 8:49AM AKDT until March 18 at 6:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow with low visibility and wind chills to 45 below occuring. Plan on areas of poor visibilities to create difficult travel conditions at times. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow. Visibility will be on half mile or less at times. Wind chills to 45 below. * WHERE...The Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...Until 6 AM Friday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds gusting as high as 55 mph will cause areas of blowing and drifting snow. Cold wind chills as low as 45 below zero will cause frostbite in as little as 10 minutes to exposed skin. Visibility will improve slowly late Thursday night as winds slowly decrease, but cold wind chills will persist into Friday morning. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for blowing snow means periods of blowing snow will cause travel difficulties.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
